[[File:Higround Merchandise Overview.png|thumb|Image of all merchandise released as part of the ''Minecraft'' x Higround collaboration.]]
'''''Minecraft'' x Higround''' is a [[merchandise]] collaboration between ''[[Minecraft]]'' and gaming keyboard company Higround.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-x-higround|Minecraft x Higround|May 22, 2024|Cristina Aderca}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/higround-x-minecraft-collection|title=Creative Game-Themed Peripherals|author=Michael Hemsworth|website=TREND HUNTER|date=May 23, 2024}}</ref> Various keyboards, mousepads, and other merchandise were released as part of the collaboration to celebrate ''Minecraft''<nowiki/>'s [[15th anniversary]]. The collaboration was announced on May 22, 2024, the eighth day of the [[15 Days of Minecraft]]. The merchandise had a limited release on May 29, 2024, at 19:00 UTC and is currently widely available.

== Quotes ==
